attributes.action: Hold an definitive Investigation into whether Islam is a peaceful religion.
attributes.additional_details: It is time that a debate took place and an investigation for a definitive answer as to whether The Koran is of itself a cause of Radicalisation.  It is time for the 109 passages calling for action against non believers was examined and a decision made as to whether these are appropriate in the 21st century.  This would be for the good of all Muslims and all Non Muslims.
attributes.background: So many people feel that Islam is a Violent and Racist religion that we need a definitive debate taking evidence from all sides of the argument and a parliamentary vote taking place after a debate so that followers of Islam are freed from the stigma that The Koran is the cause of radicalisation.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about things that the Government and Parliament aren't responsible for. They aren't responsible for making decisions about religions in the way you describe.
